feed.title: OneUptime Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for OneUptime: 7.0.4230
entry.content: No significant changes were made. We have just fixed minor bugs for this release. You can find the detailed information in the commit history.

entry.title: New release for OneUptime: 7.0.4232
entry.content:
<details> <summary>Changes</summary>
- feat: Replace CPU usage calculation with gopsutil's cpu.Percent for improved accuracy - PR: #1899
</details>

entry.title: New release for OneUptime: 7.0.4235
entry.content: No significant changes were made. We have just fixed minor bugs for this release. You can find the detailed information in the commit history.

entry.title: New release for OneUptime: 7.0.4239
entry.content:
<details> <summary>Changes</summary>
- Fix undefined as domain name when saving custom SSL-Certs - PR: #1905
</details>

entry.title: New release for OneUptime: 7.0.4245
entry.content:
<details> <summary>Changes</summary>
- Fix permission issues if otel-collector runs as non root - PR: #1911 - Exclude parameter "replicas" in Deployments, if autoscaling.enabled = true - PR: #1910 - Fix common tests - PR: #1908
</details>
